sentences: Meie saatusest sõltub palju meie tulevikku.
context: In Estonian, 'saatuse' is the partitive case form of the word 'saatus', which means fate or destiny. It refers to the predetermined course of events in one's life that is believed to be inevitable and beyond human control. The partitive case here indicates that we are talking about something related to fate or perhaps a portion/aspect of it.
